message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm willing to part with it for $20,000.
I'm really interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget, but the product's value is quite high. How about we meet at $17,000?
I'm still interested in the product, but $17,000 is a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $13,500. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
